author: yperbasis
content: accessLists is an array of arrays because you can specify multiple accounts, and for each account you can specify multiple storage. Thus 2D. See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2930#specification

author: chfast
content: That's clear, but there is one additional top-level array of these.

author: chfast
content: It is also unclear if access list should be ignored or used before London.
